title: Household budget coordination across competing needs
description: Household budget coordination across competing needs
content:
Scenario: Household budget coordination across competing needs
    Given the household has limited financial resources
    And Tommy needs school supplies, Emma needs sports equipment
    And utilities need paying and groceries need buying
    When Sarah manages household budget
    Then the household_elohim should coordinate across all needs
    And it should surface conflicts and trade-offs
    And it should help prioritize based on family values
    And budget decisions should be transparent to both partners
    And financial management should be recognized as skilled labor
    And Sarah's budget work should accumulate care tokens
